name: Mad Town Affliction
description:
Features:
- One of the best shooters! A dynamic 3D third-person shooter with cool gameplay and race elements
- A huge variety of cars: for the family, for the brutal
- oil, and sports punishments for those who love speed and racing!
- Conceptual HD graphics
- A large and dynamic open world
- A huge arsenal of guns to choose from! What would you prefer: the most powerful pistol in the world or the biggest hand minigun and behind the shoulders of an RPG?
- Intriguing storyline
- Purchase and control of real estate
- Challenge the fastest drivers on the islands
- If you are far from the Internet, you can play offline, without the Internet and wifa.
- Excellent game, which you can download for free

The plot of the game:
The criminal drama "Mad Town Affliction" tells the story of the ascent to the summit of the mafia clan Gooch Nel, who controlled organized crime in a mad city, a simple guy Luke Batkov, who became the "Godfather of a mad city". Luke began his career in the 1990s, starting from the very bottom. He undertook to perform the simplest assignments and did his job perfectly well.

The devotion of the mafia and cold-blooded calculation helped Luke to rise and become a key figure in the criminal world of a mad city. Following only its code, get rid of all competitors and become a powerful mafia boss, but faced with a problem that it was very difficult to solve. I planned to pass it on to my son, but he only wants to stay away from the criminal world ...

P.S. Thank you, dear users, for your comments and propositions. That’s very important for us! We’re doing our best to give you pleasure and enjoyment.
